website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice if you need a heavy-duty car air freshener to tackle both odors and airborne bacteria. Hospital-grade formula is ideal for stubborn odors and lingering germs.
pros: Formulated to eliminate harmful airborne germs and bacteria
Originally made for use in hospitals and health care facilities
Removes odors instead of just masking them
A little goes a long way
Versatile application is ideal for home and automotive use
cons: Potent initial odor can be overpowering and needs some time to dissipate

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting smoke smell out of vents!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! Worth every penny. I got a car that was heavily smoked in. First thing i did was replace cabin air filter in that vehicle. Next step turn AC to full blast and not on recirculate!! then sprayed this product into the AC air intake by windshield wipers on outside of car. This took all the cigarette smell out of the air vents!! I was amazed!! i also turned it to max heat then repeated. After that i put it on recirculate and sprayed it into the drivers side floor. Couple weeks later and vents still smell good smoke smell never returned!!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer S.Top Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: This is not safe to breath or to use around animals, but otherwise fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of comments about the scent and I just wanted to say that you shouldn't smell it, if you are smelling it then you aren't using it properly. It is extremely effective as an odor neutralizer, and it doesn't take long for the room to clear out and become safe to breathe but don't spray it and then inhale it. You shouldn't get it on your skin, and definitely not in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This smells like a public bathroom in a 3-star restaurant initially
customer_reviews.text: PRO: In 24hrs, the smell of the (eternal 420 hotbox) (cigarettes) (rotting carcass) that is in your car will be completely gone. CON: This smells like a public bathroom in a 3-star restaurant initially. PRO: The smell of Ozium will fade within 24 hours, taking any other nasty smells with it. CON: Spray and get out because this sh!t smells TOXIC
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Order: TIP
customer_reviews.text: 2nd order...love this item!! TIP: My teen has the stinkiest feet that you could ever imagine!! I take her sneakers (which will make your eyes water!) and put them in a plastic grocery bag at night...then I spray a couple of quick shots of Ozium in the bag and quickly close it tight and secure it with a bread bag tie. The next morning the horrendous odor is gone! I do this once a week or so and it seems to be really working good. Now if only it were safe to spray it directly on her feet...lol. Highly recommend...but remember...less is more with this product. A quick 1-2 second spray in the center of a room works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry C.

customer_reviews.title: Best odor neutralizer available
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Ozium for over 20 years, both in my car and in my home. This is very powerful stuff, so a quick 1/2 second burst is all that is needed to freshen a room. I spray this directly into my home's A/C intake vent, one quick spritz per room, and within seconds the whole house smells fresh. It has a very bright lemon essence. This even worked to neutralize odors coming from my cat's litter box. The cat has intestinal bowel disease, so her excrement is especially pungent, but one spritz aimed at the box, and the smell is gone completely and permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Ben T.

customer_reviews.title: t like my car or house to smell like smoke
customer_reviews.text: I'm a smoker, but I don;t like my car or house to smell like smoke. I use this in my car and in my house, and you would never know I smoke in either place. My husband is a non-smoker, and he agrees that this removes the odor. When I used anything else like Febreze, it just is like spraying an odor over another odor. This doesn't do that at all. It has a slight scent but dissipates quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing covers up that pot smell like ozium. 60s Flashback.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Roskos

customer_reviews.title: The tent smelled like a locker room
customer_reviews.text: Let my son borrow my tent and cot for Boy Scout summer camps. Went there to check on him. The tent smelled like a locker room. I sprayed some of this in there. Told him to spray it everyday. When I picked him up there was no smell in the tent at all. Also when the air conditioner is a little musky I give it a quick blast and it smells great for days.
customer_reviews.author: geo

customer_reviews.title: Chemicals-abound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the suggestion of a friend, to eliminate the light smoke smell in a truck I bought. I gave it a good effort a few days ago, and got back in the truck tonight. This doesn't neutralize odors, it covers them, with a nasty chemical residue that ends up airborne. I'm sensitive to smoke, some dusts, and many cleaning agents. A ten minute test drive, ended up with the windows down in 24 degrees, just to be able to breathe. My chest will be hurting for a few days from this. Sorry Ozium...you fail.
customer_reviews.author: vbrad511

customer_reviews.title: Works if your smoker (or whoever, maybe smelly teenager?) uses it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great, whenever it's used. I got this because my mother lives in one of my downstairs rooms which is the only one that I allow smoking in, for her sake only. Well, lo and behold it kinda starts to reek like the tobacco is made from ground-up turds or something. This stuff neutralizes the odor for a time. Only thing better would be if I made her go outside in the weather to smoke, or if she didn't smoke at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help with chemical lemon smell left in  used car (5 uses)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get the smell of cleaner or some kind of weird chemical sprayed into a used car I bought that smelled horribly (like a lemon cleaning chemical). I sprayed it in every night for five nights. It smells VERY strong and you have to immediately leave the area. Anyway, every day I'd return to the car smelling exactly like it did the previous day. It might have worked 5% at most. If you cannot find and eliminate the SOURCE - this does not work. I have to get my car's interior deep cleaned. Spraying this doesn't do anything.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't just mask the smell with an equally as unpleasant one (Febreze mixed with cat waste just doesn't cut it)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover up my cat's stinky stinky poops (you know, right after he goes when it's absolutely unbearable) as his litter box is in the bathroom directly connected to my bedroom, and the smell wafts. This air sanitizer does the trick! It doesn't just mask the smell with an equally as unpleasant one (Febreze mixed with cat waste just doesn't cut it); it really seems to eliminate it. Just a light one-second spray does the trick, and you're left with a distinctly clean smell. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Arya Ishigeaki

customer_reviews.title: Astoundingly good!
customer_reviews.text: One second spray per room, and you'd never know anyone had ever smoked in this house. I'm absolutely astounded! I'm about to go give the car a half second. That ought to do it. Tip: spray just before you leave the area. It's seriously strong stuff. The lemon scent is lovely but strong, and completely dissipates in minutes, leaving clean fresh air. Honestly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: M. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Seriously dangerous product
customer_reviews.text: Based on the warnings on the can, I won’t use this routinely. I will keep it for emergencies. If I need to use it,I will wear safety goggles, hold my breath, spray a 1-second burst into the center of the room and leave quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Walter K. Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Kills odors; intense smell
customer_reviews.text: I'm not fond of the intense smell of this product. But Dang! It eliminates odors. I'm deeply skeptical of the "air sanitizer" claim. Very few odors are caused by "airborne bacteria," and I'm sure that anything that killed a lot of bacteria in the air would probably kill us, too. But if you can tolerate the smell of Ozium, you'll probably be gratified by how thoroughly it works on smells. Even with the strong smell, it seems to eliminate most odors, as well as covering them.
customer_reviews.author: W. Handy

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray. I hate the initial scent but then after it goes away all the bad odors are gone with it! I have a cat and my daughter has 2 dogs... 1 that constantly comes in my room and pees on my stuff!!!! HATE THAT!!!! This spray actually took that awful urine smell outta here. Now I have a gate to keep him out of my room. Think he comes in to mark his territory from my cat! Thank u so much for this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra A Richesin

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, 10/10 recommend and 100% planning to rebuy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this larger can after my tiny one ran out. The reason is simply because it it's an amazing product! We use it in our van all of the time, only a few quick sprays. You do have to reapply, but not for about 14-20 days. It lasts longer than any other product we have used, but it does have to be reapplied and is definitely a chemical. It does remove the smell durint that time frame. Make sure that you give whatever you are spraying plenty of time to air out! I recommend having a filtered mask and possibly goggles while using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gwmoon

customer_reviews.title: Depending on your situation you may have to use this ...
customer_reviews.text: Depending on your situation you may have to use this more than once. But it's very effective, just be careful not to breath it in while working with it. (Common sense), as it's basically ozone in a can. Likewise, cleaning an area first should always be step one.
customer_reviews.author: Technodog

customer_reviews.title: Too many hazards making it UNSAFE for use.
customer_reviews.text: This product should be outlawed. It has so many hazards listed on the can that I don't know where you would ever want to spray this. Scared me. If you don't want to be sick or dead, I would suggest NOT to buy this. Please take it off the market immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 6 uses! Nozzle is useless:(
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, the nozzle broke after six uses (in small apartment!) Also disappointed that it smells mostly like lemon pledge. I wanted to cover up the smell it left right after I used it. Do you ask: did I smell the smell I was trying to eliminate in the first place after using this product? Answer, not immediately (cause all I could smell was a medicinal lemon scent) but when I went out and came back, the apartment smelled the same as if I didnt spray at all. AND It broke (nozzle won't push down)! What a waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: why

customer_reviews.title: Totally destroys oders with no lingering perfumes
customer_reviews.text: Why is it so hard to find an odor-eliminating product that doesn't leave behind a cloying odor of its own? Luckily, Ozium is the rare exception. It does have a clinical scent, but that smell dissipates almost instantly, along with whatever offensive odor you wanted to banish. Old Ozium cans used to have a metered dispenser spray, which I miss. Keep in mind you only need a quick burst, so don't hold the spray button down unless you are dealing with a truly life-threatening smell.
customer_reviews.author: L. Busch

customer_reviews.title: Does the job quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Ozium for years to eliminate pot smoke odors, quite effectively. My suggestion is to leave the room after spraying it - a little goes a long way, hence the high price - as it tends to diffuse in such a way that it gets in your throat, nasal passages, and lungs, and contains carcinogens. But for getting rid of odors, you can't beat it with any candles, sprays, incense, air purifiers, etc. It doesn't just mask odors, it gets rid of them. Better than an air ionizer. And quicker. Good for traffic stops when you've been hot-boxing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been aware of this product for decades, but didn't keep it on hand. I found a road killed skunk in reasonably good condition and brought it home to skin out for tanning. There was a lingering oder in the barn that was really driving my dogs crazy, so I ordered Ozium, and it took care of the remaining scent. It might have been nice to get the pigs to gargle with it, also, as they got to eat what was left when I removed the hide. Shipping was fast, too.
customer_reviews.author: fran

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy....should have read reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and now cannot use it or return it! The warning label is unbelievable on this product. I have pets and can't risk the harm to my cat if I use this product. Read the label then tried to return it only to find out it un NOT RETURNABLE!!!!! What a bunch a crap so I'm out $16! Should not be the market.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Crafter

customer_reviews.title: Ozium Large Bottle
customer_reviews.text: The product is very effective. I liked that it is aerosol to rile up the liberal wackos who claim the climate is changing...really...the climate has been changing for MILLIONS of years before man arrived....it’s normal. The sun and nature change the climate, not man. Maybe their next crisis will be the sky is falling 😂
customer_reviews.author: TRUMP 2020

customer_reviews.title: If you’ve ever wanted to hide all smell-related signs of life, have I got a product for you
customer_reviews.text: This stuff will mask the scent of all of your shame, hide your sins, and clear your acne. Doesn’t matter how awful the room smells beforehand; it’ll smell like a freshly disinfected nursing home with 1-2 sprays of this bad boy. Sure, it’s pretty toxic if you breathe it in, but just do what I do: spray it in the center of the room for a second, then leave your home and never return. Works every time.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Strong, but not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: My mother used to use this in our house when I was young. I don't remember the smell being so strong and overpowering. I wanted to eliminate odors, not put something heavier on top of it. Even with a short burst, and waiting a few minutes before we walk through the area of effect, we all end of coughing and choking on the spray. It is unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: MimiBicks

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!! Trust me
customer_reviews.text: It will get rid of a died animal smell like nothing. No wonder hospitals use this in the ac units. It's way over priced but by far the best product on the market. Works great for smokers of ppl who cant cook and if you detail cars it works wonders. I use it in my clients cars and they ask me what I used to make it smell so clean. I lie and say we just did such a great job lol
customer_reviews.author: Sam Boutwell

customer_reviews.title: Better than Febreeze
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it for mixed reasons. Effectively eliminates odors in the air but not odors in fabric. Great for the bathroom, kitchen and nursery. Worked much better than febreeze. Only time it came up short was when it couldn’t eliminate the smoker smell from my used car. It will freshen the air for about 20-30 minutes but then the smoke smell comes back again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Dh

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of odors, no covering them up.
customer_reviews.text: It really works. No smoke smell at all. Gets rid of odors, no covering them up. It is ozone so once you spray it to be safe you & your pets should stay out of the room for at least an hour or more until it dissipates completely, especially if you have asthma or lung problems.
customer_reviews.author: FaerylochTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I smoke and have cats, so litter boxes. The one room where all that happens can be nasty. A quick spray and its all good. great for when we have visiters,I can do a quick spray and no ones knows :) edited: This is the second bottle I have bought that stops spraying after a few sprays. So I have 2 full bottles but no way to use it. Makes me sad, because this stuff is great but way too expensive for just a few sprays
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm to rid a room of the smell of rat urine
customer_reviews.text: One of my kids has rats, need I say more? Sometimes I become overwhelmed by the smell, despite my kid keeping the cage scrupulously clean and running a UV light with air cleaner in their room. I bought a can of Ozium to try on my floor of the house and goodness, this stuff works like magic. It completely removes the rat-urine stink. We now have a bottle on each floor of the house and my kid is using it in their bedroom as well. It's worth 5 stars and more
customer_reviews.author: SAinVATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good thing we like the car
customer_reviews.text: We unknowingly bought a used car that had been owned by a smoker. The dealer had covered up the smell and there wasn't any other evidence. It's an ongoing process to control the smell, but if I use this in the car every evening, we can't smell the odor the next day. I'm sure I'll be buying more. Good thing we like the car!
customer_reviews.author: chiaroscuro

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best.
customer_reviews.text: Ozium is the best odor eliminator I know of, hands-down. I've read of some health concerns with some of the components of Ozium, so only spray it when the room/car/etc. is going to be empty. But this stuff wipes out cigarette smoke, and one could not hope for better in an air freshener. Leaves behind a faint & pleasant citrusy smell, which dissipates very quickly. Do note that this is a fairly large can; a great value, but larger than you'd like to keep in the glovebox.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Did not remove chemical/smoke smell from car
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this into the car through the ventilation as well as directly into the interior and left it sealed in there for 48 hours, but it did not remove or even hide the scent at all - it smelled identical to before I sprayed it, but with some (unsavory) Ozium smell added in. This car has smoke/chemical smell likely harshest in the headliner, but Ozium did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Saucier

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product is smells great but I wish it came in different sense and the larger bottles than the smaller ones only come in different sense which is unfair because I like the different sense but it does what it needs to do but I use spray so much cuz I have animals that it goes really fast
customer_reviews.author: Katiana Mirvil

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Air
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to freshen the stale air in a house that had been closed up for a year. It worked immediately especially when used in a room with a ceiling fan. The fragrance was not overbearing like traditional air fresheners with fragrance. Great value for the outcome. Will keep this in supply.
customer_reviews.author: Gapa

customer_reviews.title: Does an awesome job!
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt smell like roses, but heck. It gets the job done for sure! Before going inside for the night, I'd SPRAY my car ALL over and keep the windows up! Next day, my vehicle smelled as if nothing nasty was ever smoked or brought into the vehicle! Amazing at its job. Definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: if an oral surgeon can stare down the mouth of his patients with a breath as sweet as jasmine
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell y'all about Ozium. Long long time ago in another land in a far away universe, I worked for an oral surgeon. And this man would chimney smoke in his office in between surgeries. The doc's office was 20ft from his surgery, and the star of this program was Ozium. Now, if an oral surgeon can stare down the mouth of his patients with a breath as sweet as jasmine, and nary a complaint, this is a miracle product. And the $10.94 is well worth the price with Prime free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Best odor remover
customer_reviews.text: I love this sanitizer, it really does remove odors quickly. I am not sure if it reduces airborne bacteria, but it works well as a odor remover. I deducted one star because the price on Amazon is twice as much for the same can as on walmart.
customer_reviews.author: MRG

customer_reviews.title: The smell was originally like a strong vinegar smell
customer_reviews.text: This product really did clear out the funky smell coming from my AC vents. The smell was originally like a strong vinegar smell. I added the Ozium to the vents and intakes as directed, and within a couple of treatments, no more AC stench! One word of caution: keep your windows cracked open a bit after you've added the treatment to let it air out...it has a powerful cinnamon-like smell! It's not a bad smell but it can be a bit overwhelming!
customer_reviews.author: D Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My dog was "skunked" and ran in my house rubbing ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog was "skunked" and ran in my house rubbing on my furniture. I couldn't get the smell out even though the carpet and furniture were cleaned and treated. This product breaks down the molecules of skunk funk and re-scrambles them so they don't smell. This product did the job. Used it in my car too. I will be buying more to maintain a clean smell.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: CLEANS the air! No perfume, here. Used by hospitals as air sanitizer.
customer_reviews.text: The absolute, hands down, no competition air cleaner! I use it daily. Even eliminates that yucky smoke smell I thought would never go away! Be ready: use in just one second bursts and leave the room for 5 minutes. My absolute favorite but was near impossible to find anything but the small car spray cans.i will be ordering monthly!
customer_reviews.author: ELAINE

customer_reviews.title: Removes smells even in an animal shelter
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job in the animal shelter I volunteer at. Don't know what I'd do without it. Its very concentrated so one can lasts a long time. It has a nice fragrance which dissipates quickly. Not perfume-y.
customer_reviews.author: luciellenc

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past and was very satisfied. It is really good to take the smell of cigarette smoke away in my car and in my home. Also good when cooking with foods that have an odor, like brocolli and fish. Thank you for selling this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Mannke

customer_reviews.title: hands down my favorite air freshener
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is very sensitive to air fresheners and has had difficulty breathing after the use of every air freshener I’ve ever tried except this! It immediately works to get rid of bad smells without leaving the air heavy and thick. I will neve go back to other kinds of air fresheners such as febreze
customer_reviews.author: TKC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome odor Eliminator
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that you can spray however the odor seems to return back after 48 hours or maybe it's just my sensitivity to smells. But other than that it actually does work to tone down strong odors especially in cars when you have a pet.
customer_reviews.author: Gtucke277

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I can't be objective about this: For some reason I've always loved the smell of Ozium: It's kind of spicy, lemony . . . . it may not be for everyone. It does work well, however. I can't vouch for its antibacterial properties, but it certainly neutralizes most odors fast. A few spritzes are all you need in most cases.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: It's better than ordinary air fresheners
customer_reviews.text: Removes the smell of tobacco and marijuana (allegedly)... It's better than ordinary air fresheners, this one has a cleaning chemical that is unique, you'll know when you smell it
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I first tried the gel in the container to be able to sit in my car...that didn't work AT ALL..no lingering scent..nothing..so decided to try the spray...ANOTHER MISTAKE...the smell is ok when you spray...then it's gone..it does not help or cover up any scent you trying to get rid of...THIS LINE OF PRODUCT is a waste of your money and there is no refund...i didnt even wanted to give it 1 star but it wouldnt let me leave it blank..terrible product
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an Odor Eliminator with Freshness
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for freshening the stale sir in our condo stairwell. It’s great for bathroom use - not a coverup, definitely eliminates odor. Takes away the “stinkiness”! Don’t need to spray a lot; can be overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R. Keel

customer_reviews.title: Works good for smoke and frying smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the ozium. I’m not fond of the smell however it eliminates odors very good. So I’ll put up with the smell. I wanted to try the new vanilla but the price is ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: kim s.

customer_reviews.title: The best for smoke odor
customer_reviews.text: Nothing works better to cover the smell of smoke. Use very sparingly as it is strong, but at least it doesn't smell like some cheap, fruity air freshener. A couple of sprays is enough - any more will be overpowering after a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Too strong for the home
customer_reviews.text: This product is very strong, I imagine that it does clean and sanitize the air but when you spray it,I highly recommend that you leave your house and also don't leave any animals or other household pets in the house,it had me and my sister coughing and gasping for air.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Formulated through quantum computing
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly citrus scented and makes it seem as though the bad things never happened. I bet a couple cans of this could go toe-to-toe with the stink from a chicken packing plant. Also, if you spray it in the bowl before unleashing the upside-down, you'll think you've sluiced out a pile of orange peels instead of that unmitigated disaster formerly known as yesterday's questionable leftover thai curry.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice lemon scent
customer_reviews.text: I used this to remove the smell of cigarettes on a bag I purchased. It has a nice lemon scent and helped quite a bit, it didn’t remove it completely but it was definitely better. I was hoping it would take it completely away but cigarette odors are tough to get rid of. It did take away the musty scent on another bag so that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Dobben

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for eliminating odors, however, it is packed with tons of dangerous chemicals that is harmful to the body. It gets the job done, but do not miss out on reading the instructions. It can cause health issues if misused.
customer_reviews.author: Aleque

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works for the type of smoke you're scanning the reviews for.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this stuff in my house for several years now, specifically for getting rid of the smell of a certain type of smoke that is not cigarette smoke ;) This stuff in combination with a smokebuddy filter or any other charcoal filter kills any suspicious smells, especially if you turn on a fan as well.
customer_reviews.author: Katy J

customer_reviews.title: Will cover up the musk of yesterday’s mistakes
customer_reviews.text: Whoa This little air freshener will be your best friend the next time you entertain folks at your place.. My apt already has a stale odor due to its age and location (basement) but I finally feel confident to invite friends over for a little rosé, cheese, and “the bachelor “ viewing.
customer_reviews.author: MeowMeow

customer_reviews.title: #1 ODOR KILLER
customer_reviews.text: Have an odor that you can't get rid of ? Spray some " OZONE " in your air conditioner intake or air handler in your house to get a fresh smelling house again. Also, works in car air vents if you have any smoke odor ect... Try it ,you will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: CHYANNE

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Stink Out!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this in the corporate setting to cleanse my bosses office from his illegal smoking. It really worked! So hence forth I decided to look for it on-line. Very pleasant lemony scent & does rid room of unpleasant odors and/or smoke. Glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: RIker

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as desired
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work as well as I had hoped to eliminate smoke smell from a renter. Used it multiple times over several days after he moved out and smell remained
customer_reviews.author: R. Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Only Ozium Is Ozium
customer_reviews.text: No other product like this anywhere. Grew up with this handy spray in the household and I'm glad I've continued the tradition of having it as part of my own home. As well I'm gifting a can to my sister at her request.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin1

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way. I don’t smoke ...
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. I don’t smoke, but I am a part time driver. The smell of smoke sticks to people, which then saturated my truck. I wipe everything down and spray this and the smell is gone. It will give you a headache if you use too much.
customer_reviews.author: Enterprise Inc

customer_reviews.title: Meh, not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Really not that impressed. The other reviews had me stoked. I use it, but it doesn't seem to last long. The scent is noticeable to me, it's alright but not great. It doesn't seem to eliminate any concern when there's an odor it issue.
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great, works as intended!
customer_reviews.text: Still on the same one from year ago. Light spray if house smells (cooking,bathroom, etc). Leave room because it’s quite strong. Use in cars, boats, musty people’s homes. Works to remove smells that have been there for long time.
customer_reviews.author: Supergod7

customer_reviews.title: It temporary helped get rid of the smoke smell from ...
customer_reviews.text: It temporary helped get rid of the smoke smell from my used car but after a day the smell returns.
customer_reviews.author: collegestudent

customer_reviews.title: Doubted, but wont anymore
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a very old used car from someone in which the car smelled horribly of marijuana. I could not get the smell out after scrubbing everything myself and then a professional car detail. A friend suggested this and it worked miraculously. Just a 1 treatment of this (even in the vent system and my girlfriend could tell the difference. After a few more it was cured. Trust this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Morales Jr.

customer_reviews.title: didn't work as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: I did not find that this worked as well for me as it did for others. I was trying to remedy an odor from a couch I bought used which had a very strong dog smell on it. I used as directed as often as directed and the couch's smell still persists. In addition I did not love the citrus scent to this- but this brand does offer a different scent.
customer_reviews.author: Bhealz

customer_reviews.title: My car still smells of smoke.
customer_reviews.text: I was told to use this to get the smoke smell out of my car. All it did was make the car smell like Ozium for almost a week, and then the smoke smell came back; it had the same effect as Febreeze. The smoke smell was from luggage and pillows covered in it, and it transferred to the car over time. Am I using the wrong version of this? I welcome suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Just an old fashioned consumer

customer_reviews.title: True order elimination!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal..... true order elimination, not just smoke, mildew and/or pet. Noone locally can beat this price, not even close. Awesome value!
customer_reviews.author: kelly.david66

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say how good this product is. We got smokers in the house. It eliminate the smoke smell in minutes. But smell like a restaurant restroom for about 30 minutes. When the smell is gone, it took the odor away with it.
customer_reviews.author: HarSir

customer_reviews.title: Get a better smelling one
customer_reviews.text: I wish I got one that smells better. But took care of the wierd smell when I first start my A/C since my vehicle doesn’t have a cabin air filter this is the only thing that works
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bixby

customer_reviews.title: Visiting your conservative relatives? Give this a quick spray and you're good
customer_reviews.text: You know the feeling, long drive to see the fam so you fire one up on the interstate. A quick spray upon arrival makes your subaru smell a lot less like a music festival ;)
customer_reviews.author: David Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I can still smell cigarette smoke after using it for 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to get rid of Cigarrette smoke in my condo. So far I'm on week three and I can smell the smoke.
customer_reviews.author: thunder

customer_reviews.title: If you drive for Uber or Lyft, this is a must.
customer_reviews.text: If you drive for Uber or Lyft, having this is a must. You know you ade going to pick up those that smell of basil. You know, that devil's cabbage. After the ride you got a nice contact buzz going on, but the next pax may wot want to smell it. A quick spray of this product, and the odor is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis in Warren MI

customer_reviews.title: Did not remove smoke smell from heavily smoked in car.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a used truck that was heavily smoked in. As other reviewers suggested I turned the AC on circulate and put just about the entire can through the vents and let sit overnight. The smoke smell was still there. Perhaps it would work better on a lighter odor but did not work for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in car for campfire smell
customer_reviews.text: Got about 90% of the campfire smell out of my car. A little tree masks what it missed. Definitely worth it because my wife was complaining about the smell for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ozium spray is great. Some people are sensitive to the smell when first applied but it does dissipate. Use sparingly, even if you cant smell it for 10-20 seconds it spreads.
customer_reviews.author: IAMTHECAKE

customer_reviews.title: Does eliminate odors
customer_reviews.text: I live in an rv...this product works great. You just need to spray once. One lil spray goes along ways.
customer_reviews.author: Bella2016

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoke
customer_reviews.text: It's great for getting rid of cigarette smoke, I work around a bunch of smokers and it does well. It doesn't keep the smell away, but it will always eliminate it. The scent is quite strong, I recommend letting the air settle before going in again. But it doesn't smell bad
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Car smoke
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a car I bought used heavily smoked in lasted a couple of days but smells again going to try spraying in vents to see if that helps
customer_reviews.author: Tristinmom

customer_reviews.title: No stinky mildew.
customer_reviews.text: Product is very effective. I use it to decrease the mildew smell in my basement storage shed. My son-in-law uses it in the bathroom to get rid of toilet stinky. My friend uses it to decrease multiple cat smells.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kovar

customer_reviews.title: My hero
customer_reviews.text: I love this product —I used to smoke inside the apartment and this Air freshener is One of the kind takes all the smell off
customer_reviews.author: hatim alshamrani

customer_reviews.title: ... cover up the smoke from my cigarettes and is pretty strong. I only use two sprays in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This spray covers up the smoke from my cigarettes and is pretty strong. I only use two sprays in the middle of the car when I exit. Not sure if it will leave a stain on my cloth seats but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: it is better at eliminating strong odor compared to febreze
customer_reviews.text: very effective at removing odors. I mostly used it to cover smoke odor. it does have a weird smell initially when u spray it. to compare: it is better at eliminating strong odor compared to febreze, but febreze smells much better.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Squenchington

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, overpowers smoke smell to the point you'd never ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, overpowers smoke smell to the point you'd never know someone smoked in the car- but does not erase it. The stain of tobacco odor remains after the citrus perfume fades.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Covers up the smell of smoke
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job of covering up the smell of smoke from my neighbors apartment. Does not mask it completely but works better than any other spray. The smell is neither pleasant nor offensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: You just need to spray a little t is perfect
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly when there is an oder in the room It’s almost as strong
customer_reviews.author: Manal GilmanGreenan

customer_reviews.title: cleans odors from car.
customer_reviews.text: I think it worked for my car, killing some odor. I think I am going to use a couple of them in gaps of a month at a time. I watched a video on Youtube how someone sprays it in the air suction area of the car into the system. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mixpresso Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Does remove bad odors
customer_reviews.text: This product actually worked well at removing bad odors, I personally didn’t care for the smell of product. That’s why I only gave it four stars but it did take out and remove the smoke odor/smell.
customer_reviews.author: a bates

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!
customer_reviews.text: My mother got me on this Ozium stuff. She used it in a recliner that my dad sat in all the time. She also used it on the sofa that only the dog was allowed to sit in. This stuff is pretty amazing! I keep a small container in my truck at all times. Awesome engineering!
customer_reviews.author: Chari

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my neighbor. She told me this did the job. Was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Scapegoat

customer_reviews.title: Listen
customer_reviews.text: It works but make sure you have ventilation after you spray it or the room just smells funky. Id spray it, leave the door open, and have a fan on by the door if you can. I'd say it take the smoke out of the room (and the smell itself, which is a citrus cinnamon) in around 6 hours. Do not use if you're urgently trying to get the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: .MMCR2007Xxlmao no

customer_reviews.title: A very versatile product
customer_reviews.text: I resell Preloved Designer bags. It removes any musty smell and even cigarette order.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Connors

customer_reviews.title: Kills cigarette smoke odors
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. The smaller size 0.6 oz @ 3.99 which I was okay with from a local vendor. I just didn't want to go shopping. While on Amazon I found 8 oz at $17.43 ea which is a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Work!  Nice scent.
customer_reviews.text: A family member used without me knowing. I asked what is that nice smell? Really works and is pleasant. Does not have that cheap bathroom spray but something refreshing and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pchop

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. I have a wood burning stove and despite ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I have a wood burning stove and despite having chimney sweeps, it still smokes in my house. The smell lingered for over a week despite my incessant cleaning with vinegar and Lysol. Now, I spray this when I open the door to add more wood (that's when smoke escapes) and after the fire has died down, before I go to bed. When I go downstairs in the morning, there's no smoke smell which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: but it works great. Personally
customer_reviews.text: Don't use it for the same reasons as in the 70's, but it works great. Personally, I don't find the initial smell when sprayed bad at all, and any smell dissipates pretty quickly. It neutralizes odors instead of covering them up with a heavy floral smell. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: mikep

customer_reviews.title: Not just an air FRESHENER, BUT an air SANITIZER as well
customer_reviews.text: Most of us realize that it isn’t easy to find an air sanitizer these days, due to the pandemic. I reviewed many on line and decided to try the Ozium. Very pleased with my decision. Eliminates bacteria & odors. The scent is very subtle & pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M. Campbell

product_meta.title: Ozium 805539 1-Piece Air Freshener & Sanitizer
product_meta.description: Size:1-Piece Ozium air sanitizing spray is clinically proven to eliminate offensive odors rather than masking them. Originally developed to combat airborne bacteria and germs in hospitals and health care facilities. WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals which is [are] known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.
feature_bullets: MULTI-USE ODOR ELIMINATING AIR SANITIZER: OZIUM eliminates stubborn odors from smoke and tackles other offensive everyday smells found in bathrooms, musty closets, cars, kitchens, trash cans, offices, sweaty shoes and more.
CLEANS THE AIR YOU BREATHE: OZIUM sanitizes and deodorizes the air, temporarily reducing bacteria and germs that cause unpleasant odors, leaving the air smelling fresh.

TRUSTED & VALIDATED: Trusted for over 50 years, OZIUM was originally developed to combat airborne bacteria and germs in hospitals and is clinically-proven to eliminate unpleasant odors, not just mask them.
MORE THAN JUST AN AIR FRESHENER: OZIUM air sanitizing spray isn’t your typical home or car air freshener, it makes smells disappear by reducing odor-causing bacteria and germs.

EFFECTIVE AND EASY TO USE: Just a short spray cleans the air with a light burst of fragrance that disappears with the odor; there’s no overwhelming or overpowering fragrance that you get with other air fresheners.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,329 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
